EmailTemplate.name: June12Web: LinkedIn.Sorry We Missed You
EmailTemplate.subject: Since You Missed it - Free Resources from our LinkedIn Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our “LinkedIn for Independent Consultants: 5 Steps to Enhance Your Profile & Bring in More Clients” held on Thursday, June 28th. Although you were not able to attend, we appreciate your interest.
Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. We hope you find them informative:
- Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-linkedin-independent-consultants-5-steps-enhance-your-profile-bring-more-clients> - Webinar slide deck <http://www.mbopartners.com/sites/mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-linkedin-webinar-slides-6.28.12.pdf> - Webinar Q&A <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/62812-linkedin-webinar-qa> - Melissa Washington on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=1408083&locale=en_US&trk=tyah>
- Five Easy Ways to Grow Your LinkedIn Network <http://www.networksolutions.com/smallbusiness/2012/06/5-easy-ways-to-grow-your-linkedin-network/>
Additionally, we invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>.
Thank you,
THE MBO MARKETING TEAM t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com
